name: Ocean Bedroom Experience
description:
You bought a home by the sea and hoped for a comfortable retirement but it's too damn noisy! 

A vertical slice of gameplay showcasing initial design treatment created from scratch in 50 hours.

Constructive feedback welcome.

Controls

WASD: Move

Mouse: Aim

Mouse left button: Interact

Installation:

  • Download zip file
  • Extract files
  • Run .exe file
